snippet: Angered by teacher sickouts that have closed many Detroit schools, majority Republicans in Michigan’s Legislature proposed legislation to make it easier to deem such work stoppages illegal strikes.
abstract: Republicans in Michigan Legislature propose bill that would ease way for deeming work stoppages, like sickouts carried out by Detroit teachers, to be illegal strikes; teacher strikes are illegal in Michigan.
lead_paragraph: Angered by teacher sickouts that have closed many Detroit schools, majority Republicans in Michigan’s Legislature proposed legislation to make it easier to deem such work stoppages illegal strikes.

headline.main: Michigan: Lawmakers Try to Toughen Strike Laws
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Lawmakers Try to Toughen Strike Laws
